segments.text: Excuse me . I lost my way . Could you tell me where the scholar cinema is , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The Scholar ? Let me see . Oh ... yes , Of course I know . It ’ s in the Lincoln Square .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . It ’ s just a few minutes walk . Turn left at the traffic light , and you ’ ll see it .
segments.speaker: S2
